main event: Multiple reports of UFO sightings were made over Herman, Pennsylvania on December 5, 1960, with one observer describing a bright reddish-orange light and another describing a circular object traveling at high speeds.
interesting points: The reddish-orange light hovered for 5-7 minutes before moving slowly and then accelerating rapidly when a plane approached., The circular object was observed for 2-3 minutes and made a definite turn during its flight., The estimated speed of the circular object was 400-600 mph., There were at least three witnesses who agreed on what they saw., No sounds were reported during the sightings.
sighted object: a bright reddish-orange light and a circular object
witness description: A college president and several observers, including a college professor.
